entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 10:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: ENE 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
